desc: Eddie Wold Art is a unique ground metal art, fine art studio specializing in home and commercial art. From home decor art to commercial business signage, and nearly everything in between.

layout.text: FINE ART STUDIO SPECIALIZING IN GROUND METAL ART

EDDIE WOLD ART IS A UNIQUE GROUND METAL ART, FINE ART STUDIO SPECIALIZING IN HOME AND COMMERCIAL ART. FROM HOME DÉCOR ART TO COMMERCIAL BUSINESS SIGNAGE, AND NEARLY EVERYTHING IN BETWEEN. EDDIE WOLD ART ALSO CREATES ART ON VEHICLES, MOTORCYCLES, HELMETS, PRETTY MUCH ANYTHING YOU CAN THINK OF. BROWSE THROUGH THE ART GALLERIES TO SEE THE WIDE ARRAY OF ART!
